content: 2016 short film ***I Believe*** is a 2016 Singaporean short film directed by student director Leroy Lim. [Mm2 Entertainment](/wiki/Mm2_Entertainment) have opted to produce Lim's first full-length film. ## Cast - Joshua Lim as Peter - [Maxi Lim](/wiki/Maxi_Lim) as Anthony - Yap Hui Xin as Janice - Smiley Goh as Paster Benjamin - Derric Cheong as Peter's friend 1 - Sean Lee Kah Wai as Peter's friend 2 - Faith Toh as Anthony's mother ## Production *I Believe* was produced with Lim's schoolmates, Nikko Koh and Dhinesh Ravichandran from [LASALLE College of the Arts](/wiki/LASALLE_College_of_the_Arts). Veteran filmmaker [Wee Li Lin](/wiki/Wee_Li_Lin) was the project mentor. This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: I Believe (film)
